title: Batman Arkham Origins Initiation-RELOADED
description:
nERv

Batman: Arkham Origins - Initiation DLC (c) WB Games
01/2014: RELEASE.DATE .. PROTECTION: Steam
1: DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE: Action

Note

This release is an addon for Batman.Arkham.Origins-RELOADED
It will add the Initiation addon DLC. It will also update your game to
newest version. No previous update is required to apply this addon

Travel back to the days before there was a Batman and take control of a
young Bruce Wayne as he completes his martial arts training. Experience
exotic locales including a bamboo forest and mountain-top monastery. This
pack contains Bruce Wayne and Vigilante skins, four challenge maps, and a
challenge campaign

1. Unrar
2. Burn or mount the image
3. Install the addon to where you installed the game
4. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory on the image to
your game install directory
5. Play the game
6. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT


System Requirements:


OS: 32-bit: Vista, Win 7, Win 8 
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, 2.4 GHz / AMD Athlon X2, 2.8 GHz 
Memory: 2 GB RAM 
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GTS / AMD Radeon HD 3850 or better 
with 512 MB of VRAM 
DirectX: 9.0c 
Hard Drive Space: 20 GB 
Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection 
Additional Notes: Windows XP and DirectX 9.0b and below not supported
